home.heroSubtitle: Check domain registration details, expiration dates, and registrar information instantly
home.inputLabel: Enter domains (one per line or comma-separated)
home.featuresSubtitle: Everything you need to analyze and monitor your domain portfolio
home.feature1Desc: Get domain information instantly with our fast RDAP/WHOIS lookup
home.feature2Desc: Query domains from registries worldwide including ICANN and ccTLDs
home.feature3Desc: View registration dates, expiration dates, and last update times
home.feature4Desc: Access registrar details including abuse contact emails
home.why1Desc: Instant WHOIS lookup saves time and improves productivity
home.why2Desc: Detailed reports help optimize your domain management strategy
home.why3Desc: Real-time analysis provides immediate and accurate feedback
home.why4Desc: Simple interface designed for both beginners and professionals
home.proSubtitle: Advanced tools for comprehensive domain analysis
home.proFeature1Desc: Analyze multiple domains simultaneously with our powerful batch processing feature
home.proFeature2Desc: Generate comprehensive reports with all domain details and expiration warnings
home.testimonialsSubtitle: Trusted by domain investors and developers
home.testimonial1Text: dqmainer saved us hours of manual work. The expiration warnings are incredibly accurate!
home.testimonial2Text: The real-time analysis feature is fantastic. We can spot domain issues instantly.
home.testimonial3Text: Domain grouping helped us identify which domains need renewal. Great insights!

apiDocs.title: API Documentation
apiDocs.note1: Supports batch queries with comma-separated domain names
apiDocs.note2: API uses RDAP and WHOIS protocols for lookups
apiDocs.note4: Current version only supports domain names, not IP addresses

footer.description: Instant domain WHOIS lookup tool. Check registration details, expiration dates, and registrar information.
